Talon:

"Rest Tucson"said softly the femme while she glenty squeeze his han=
d and she added to her team with a more profesional tone "That Creature, La=
mia, may see heat... After all, all snakes do; in darkness, she has the upp=
er hand. We must to do a segurity perimeter, if she could go out, she surel=
y can come in"

 back


  
Kenzo applied a chemical to the injury then put a patch over it.=


"This should neutralize the venom.  When we get the reactor back up you c=
an recover in the CR chamber" said Kenzo, closing the medical kit.

"Let's =
go check out those reactors!" shouted Ravenchief enthusiastically.

"Are th=
ere any heavy weapons in here?" asked Perseus.  "We should bring weapons, a=
nd lights if possible."

He walked over and opened what looked to be a weap=
ons locker.

"Right on the money." he said, taking a rifle and handing it t=
o Guardia.  Then taking one for himself.  Each rifle had a light on top whi=
ch they switched on then checked the weapons to make sure they functioned.
=

"Not thanks, I've never liked rifles.  I'll use my weapons." replied Raven=
chief, flying to the door.

"Show off." Guardia replied childishly, walking=
 to the door behind him.

"Does anyone else want a rifle, we have 2 left." =
asked Perseus.



On Wed, Jan 27, 2010 at 8:30 PM, Sandy <magicquartz@yahoo=
.com> wrote:

  Tucson could feel that she too was a bit like himself.  Uns=
ure of things, wondering if these expressions of feelings were real, instea=
d of just some cheap side effect from an infusion of venom.  At first he to=
o, is lost for words, as shyness creeps in somewhat.  Yet his expression re=
mains the same, with a smile on his face.  He didn't believe in showing off=
 as other bots may have done to impress a femme bot.  He believed in being =
sincere, and himself.

  " Thanks for - being right there with me Talon.  Y=
ou - were a big help."

  It wasn't much but he knew he made one small step=
 to building a relationship.

<P>Kenzo applied a chemical to the injury then=
 put a patch over it.<BR><BR>"This 
should neutralize the venom.  When=
 we get the reactor back up you can 
recover in the CR chamber" said Kenzo,=
 closing the medical kit.<BR><BR>"Let's go 
check out those reactors!" shou=
ted Ravenchief enthusiastically.<BR><BR>"Are 
there any heavy weapons in he=
re?" asked Perseus.  "We should bring weapons, 
and lights if possible=
."<BR><BR>He walked over and opened what looked to be a 
weapons locker.<BR=
><BR>"Right on the money." he said, taking a rifle and handing 
it to Guard=
ia.  Then taking one for himself.  Each rifle had a light 
on top=
 which they switched on then checked the weapons to make sure they 
functio=
ned.<BR><BR>"Not thanks, I've never liked rifles.  I'll use my 
weapon=
s." replied Ravenchief, flying to the door.<BR><BR>"Show off." Guardia 
rep=
lied childishly, walking to the door behind him.<BR><BR>"Does anyone else 
=
want a rifle, we have 2 left." asked Perseus.<BR><BR>
